cast.name: 吉杜·克里希那穆提 Jiddu Krishnamurti

this_title: Jiddu Krishnamurti: You Are the Rest of Humanity - Washingto
trans_title: 克里希那穆提1985年华盛顿特区讲话
introduction: You are the Rest of Humanity: Washington DC 1985, Talks 1 & 21. In the Present Is the Whole of Time2. At the End of Sorrow is PassionAlthough Krishnamurti had spoken for many years in the United States, he had never given public talks in the capital, Washington D.C. In 1985 he agreed to do so and met on two days in April of that year with large audiences from diverse backgrounds.There is a feeling in these two talks that Krishnamurti was communicating as much as possible of the teaching which he had been giving in many parts of the world for over sixty years, inviting his audiences to "walk together, investigate together, look together at the world we have created."
chinese_title: 克里希那穆提1985年华盛顿特区讲话
foreign_title: Jiddu Krishnamurti: You Are the Rest of Humanity - Washingto
